thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates 32nd birthday with mum and son after Real Madrid game postponed
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates 32nd birthday with mum and son after Real Madrid game postponed

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates 32nd birthday with mum and son after Real Madrid game postponed
text:
Sport Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates 32nd birthday with mum and son after Real Madrid game postponed Ronaldo was given the day off work after Real Madrid's game with Celta Vigo was postponed following a storm in Spain Share Ronaldo celebrated his birthday with his family (Photo: doloresaveiroofficial/Instagram)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Cristiano Ronaldo enjoyed a cake with his mum and son as he celebrated his 32nd birthday. 
The Real Madrid superstar was given an aptly-timed weekend off from football as Los Blancos' trip to Celta Vigo was postponed this weekend, allowing him to spend his birthday with his family. 
Ronaldo's mother posted a picture of herself, Ronaldo and his son, Cristiano Jr, behind an extravagant birthday game on her Instagram account. 
She captioned the snap: "Congratulations". 
Ronaldo should have spent his Sunday evening at Celta Vigo, but Real's trip to the north west was postponed following a storm. Ronaldo was given Sunday off work after the postponement (Photo: AFP) 
The roof of the Rio Alto Balaidos Stadium was left damaged and Celta officials deemed that the fixture was unable to take place for safety reasons. 
Vigo's mayor, Abel Caballero, said: "I have spoken to the Celta president, the decision is irreversible. The storm last night was very severe, taking off part of the roof. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
